package.description:
Oculus Rift Monocular vision Application Created by Evan O'Keeffe for OculusRotor ,a 4th year project for the University College Dublin (UCD)
Base code was updated from the project remote-eyes by timo.witte@gmail.com which is based off of the OculusWorldDemo from OVR
package.author: Evan O'Keeffe
